review: It's sleek, and performs well. I love the fact I can load apps on it (i.e. plex); which was the driving motivation for my to buy the two units I own.What would have been a 5 star review is now a three for one simple reason "Advertisements".The recent appearance of advertisment banners across the top above the recent bar for shows and applications is unaccceptible. What use to be a nice clean interface now looks horrible, and there appear to be no way to opt out. I seriouslly don't know how they thought they could slap an advertisement in there and think it looked good. Had I known Amazon was going to do this I would had not have purched them.
